Module com.boslott
Package com.boslott.DataAccess

Class UCertdbDAOFactory

java.lang.Object
com.boslott.DataAccess.UCertdbDAOFactory
public class UCertdbDAOFactory
extends java.lang.Object
A UCertdbDAOFactory object is a factory object used to create UCertdbDAO objects. It also holds the connection to the UCertify database that all UCertDAO objects use to obtain data with
Author:
Steven Slott

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    UCertdbDAOFactory()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    UCertdbAppointmentDAO getAppointmentDAO()
    Gets a new UCertdbAppointmentDAO object used to interact with Appointment data from the UCertify database data source
    static java.sql.Connection getConnectionInstance()
    The method available to all UCertdbDAO objects used to obtain the singleton Connection object to the UCertify database data source
    UCertdbContactDAO getContactDAO()
    Gets a new UCertdbContactDAO object used to interact with Contact data from the UCertify database data source
    UCertdbCountryDAO getCountryDAO()
    Gets a new UCertdbCountryDAO object to use to interact with Country data from the UCertify database data source
    UCertdbCustomerDAO getCustomerDAO()
    Gets a new UCertdbCustomerDAO object to use to interact with Customer data from the UCertify database data source
    UCertdbDivisionDAO getDivisionDAO()
    Gets a new UCertdbDivisionDAO object used to interact with Division data from the UCertify database data source
    UCertdbUserDAO getUserDAO()
    Gets a new UCertdbUserDAO object to use to interact with User data from the UCertify database data source

  • Method Details

    • getConnectionInstance

      public static java.sql.Connection getConnectionInstance() throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method available to all UCertdbDAO objects used to obtain the singleton Connection object to the UCertify database data source
      Returns:
      the Connection object to the UCertify database data source
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there is a database access error

    • getCustomerDAO

      public UCertdbCustomerDAO getCustomerDAO() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Gets a new UCertdbCustomerDAO object to use to interact with Customer data from the UCertify database data source
      Returns:
      an UCertdbCustomerDAO object
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if the UCertdbCustomerDAO object's construction method creates a database access error

    • getCountryDAO

      public UCertdbCountryDAO getCountryDAO() throws java.sql.SQLException

      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if the UCertifydbCountryDAO object's construction method creates a database access error
